thread.section_title: Verkter.no omtaler | Kundenes anmeldelser av Verkter.no | www.verkter.no
thread.title: Aamir Shehzad

author: Aamir Shehzad
title: Aamir Shehzad
text:
It's the first time that I have bought something from Verkter.no and my review is that they have a very trouble free smooth service, package arrived on time as they promised and I have returned something which they returned happily without any problem and even sent me a return postage barcode so I didn't have to pay any money to the Postnord.
I am very happy. I recommend all to shop on verkter.no
